news.isi: June was a busy month for turtles, and perhaps an even busier month for conservation technicians working around the clock to preserve delicate turtle eggs.

news.judul: Arctic sea ice extent just hit a record low for early June; worse may come
news.isi: On Monday, June 10, following a tumultuous May that saw massive floods and tornadoes rip through the US Midwest, heatwaves in the Southeast, and snow in the Rockies, 2019 claimed another climate crisis victim â€” sea ice.
